Articles.Content:
Maybe I'm just missing a button somewhere, but is there a way to get the mass of a vehicle, without just auditing every part? I see where the save/load menus indicate the part count, but not the mass.

Edited October 21, 2013 by Jaxal1

Currently the only method is to scribble everything down and adding it up.

You can look for mods like Kerbal Engineer Redux but for career mode you will have to edit in the mod manually.

When you launch, the map mode will tell you the mass. Otherwise, sorry.

Worse than just adding it all up, you have to know what not to add up: the plane landing gear is massless, all struts are massless, as are fuel lines.
Without mods, the only way I know is to go to launch, go to map view, and look at the knowledge base stuff on the right, which will show mass (IIRC).

Get in orbit, jettison the subassembly, and see how much your velocity changes.

Or just use Kerbal Engineer.
